Thinking about plastic surgery to boost your appearance? It is important to choose 
the best medical professionals to achieve your desired results. Our board certified 
plastic surgeon, Dr. Brian Coan, graduated from one of the finest plastic surgery 
training programs in the world, Duke University. His impeccable training coupled 
with years of plastic surgery experience make CARE Plastic Surgery unique. We 
provide the expertise you deserve. CARE is a private boutique technique. Voted 
"BEST OF DURHAM" by viewers of Durham Magazine for seven consecutive years, 
our physicians create individualized treatment prepare for each client based upon 
individual objectives and realistic goals. We are committed to excellent results and 
a terrific and also secure experience getting you there. Today's aesthetic 
marketplace offers many "quick fix" products and also treatments. On a daily basis 
we hear of a "new," "miracle," "breakthrough" cosmetic technique that seems too 
good to be true. And also it generally is. Dr. Coan depends on day on the newest 
technologies and cutting-edge surgical techniques-- and also has the experience to 
recognize what is effective as well as will work best for you. He is an internationally 
respected leader in the field of plastic surgery and also will include brand-new 
procedures or devices only if he has credible proven results. Elective surgery must 
be carefully considered and never feel rushed. Our goal at CARE Plastic Surgery is 
to guarantee that the therapy you are looking for is appropriate and also safe. We 
CARE! Just ask your friends that have experienced the CARE difference.
